html:
10.29.21  1:09 pm   is there a regularity or a pattern of the modulation when it sounds weird magical whatever?

      it has a lot to do with the whole context of what is going on in the music and the story it's telling

10.29.21  9:35 am   hey bill, did you ever have any random thoughts that you incorporate into A song?

      no thought is random. if it was made by the human brain, then it has the official non-random human verified seal of approval

10.29.21  8:28 am   how do left handed people play the guitar?

      the top 3 ways i know of: play a backwards guitar. play a normal guitar upside down. play a normal guitar normally

10.29.21  7:21 am   Today I woke up

      i can relate to that

10.29.21  4:23 am   how to i survive physics lessons?

      this might sound counter-intuitive, but you could learn physics

10.29.21  4:09 am   bill, do you own a cat?

      no

10.29.21  3:51 am   what's your favorite song you've made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.28.21  10:54 pm   do you have any pets

      no

10.28.21  9:51 pm   why do you work?  

     to get the results

     what if you stopped working?

     i wouldn't get the future results i want

       have you considered the beach?

     no

       i like the beach :)?

     the beach looks nice but i don't like to touch sand

10.28.21  9:44 pm   What is the fitness gram pacer test?

      a routine on a popular exercise product

10.28.21  9:12 pm   Which of your songs are the most proud of?

      how about the next one

10.28.21  7:39 pm   do you think you could make a sea shanty style song?

      yes

10.28.21  7:12 pm   Will there be any more videos similar to "Ball & stick" or "Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education"?

      yes but better i hope

10.28.21  7:10 pm   do you have a poem word suggestion twin-pack generator

      absolutely

10.28.21  6:42 pm   thoughts on art?

      i'll believe it when i see it

10.28.21  6:34 pm   If the meaning of life is 42,

     it's not

      then what is the meaning of death? Water? Food?

     you'd have to contact the author of the book whose idea that came from, and see if he'd like to expand the idea an extra step

      Is 42 the meaning of everything!? 

     no

10.28.21  6:13 pm   Have you ever laughed at a question on here?

      i've laughed at everything

10.28.21  5:23 pm   whats your favorite sport

      hard ball

10.28.21  5:16 pm   how do you make your videos

      hold back 90% of the way, so that when the other 10% gets out of control, it will still be on track

10.28.21  2:26 pm   what do you think about when you wake up at 2am?

      getting to work

10.28.21  1:10 pm   what do you think it would be like to live on the moon

      lonely

10.28.21  12:54 pm   how do you be cool?

      impossible. it can't be done

10.28.21  12:29 pm   i have to make a short film for an a/v class at school. what should it be about?

      everything

10.28.21  11:12 am   Can you play wonderwall

      sure

10.28.21  10:58 am   hey Bill, what should I write a song about?

      everything

10.28.21  10:29 am   have you ever wanted to operate a submarine?

      no

10.28.21  9:10 am   What is the time signature of and the day goes on?

      4/4

10.28.21  6:04 am   How did you learn how to play the piano?

      i will confess to being lucky enough to have a piano in my household at age 2. that's pretty much all it takes. it's self explanatory: each note sounds exactly the way it sounds. so it's like the whole thing is its own cheat sheet

10.28.21  5:16 am   hello bill, i was wondering about how you decide on your ratio of originality to 'regular'-ness.

     my mind goes to war with itself. it's an even match, so it's usually a tie and then my mind is dead

      do you try to be as original as possible in some aspects of the art you create,

     yes

      or do you strive to be as original as possible in EVERY aspect the art you create?

     too original would be exhausting. must pepper in the familiarity to get the right balance

      OR do you simply strive to be 'good' in the art you create, using originality as one of many ways to create something good?

     yes

     i ask because it seems like there is an interesting paradox you present by saying that so much of what you do (for example, the fonts that you use in videos) is 'normal', but i know that originality and novelty must be very valuable to you. 

     here's the thing,......... originality is normal. if you don't believe me, just ask mother nature

10.28.21  5:08 am   What time is it

      Thursday, October 28, 2021 8:35:39 PM

10.28.21  2:34 am   help me im trapped in a fluid dynamics simulator

      ok i'll be there in a minute

10.28.21  1:02 am   do you understand your own songs

      yes but there's always more to understand. that's just the way music is

10.28.21  12:06 am   Do you know what your next-next song will be?

     no

     The lendemain of your songs I guess?

     i've never heard the word lendemain, but it sounds lovely

      What about the next-next-next?

     no

     I am curious about how far ahead you plan what to release. 

     i begin the selection process for the next, after the previous production is done. the selection is usually influenced heavily by how the previous one turned out

10.27.21  11:49 pm   do you have a lot of buddies

      what the heck is a buddie

10.27.21  10:22 pm   if there were 2 additional musical notes, how much larger do you think pianos would have to be in order to accomodate them?

      about an inch

10.27.21  9:01 pm   How does the news decide what counts as news? 

      if they think it will scare the shit out of you

10.27.21  7:31 pm   Hello Mr. Wurtz, I write poems. Can you give me a one word suggestion?

      i only do it in twin-packs. here is a twin suggestion pack:
     brand
     slow

10.27.21  7:02 pm   If you ever wanted one thing out of the millions of things out there, what would you want?

      the more i read the question, the less i understand what it's saying

10.27.21  5:00 pm   is it bad that i genuinely hate doors?

     no

     what does this say about me?

     maybe you want everything to be in the same room

10.27.21  4:43 pm   Will you ever make a "record"? Like a legit record on vinal?

     yes, if technology moves backwards and the current methods of distributing music are somehow cancelled

     And will you ever make an album and not stand-alone songs? 

      probably not. it feels like albums weaken songs. and also, it feels like songs weaken albums. i find songs to be much better without the album, and, by the same token, i find albums to be much better without the songs

10.27.21  4:40 pm   What was the bad thing you did?

      doing a medium thing

10.27.21  4:26 pm   thank you.

also

do you care about what the audience thinks at all?

     yes

     if you don't care, (and i don't want to be disrespectful-- i admire you very, very, very much) why do you share your art?

is art inherently meant to be shared?

     maybe

     i suppose the real question is, would you create if you were inside a vacuum?

      first things first, could i breathe

10.27.21  3:49 pm   Do you ever think about touring?

     yes

      I'd love to come to a Bill Wurtz show.

10.27.21  3:32 pm   this might just be my ignorant brain talking, but i noticed that "la de da de da de da de day oh" and "got to know what's going on" sound kind of similar. is there any connection between the two songs?

      yes: same writer, same producer, same singer, same accompanying musician,

10.27.21  3:24 pm   if someone guessed the title of your next song correctly on this page, would you tell them before the song came out?

      no

10.27.21  3:21 pm   what is music without the element of time?

      nothing

10.27.21  1:57 pm   Why is there so much escaping in "and the day goes on"?

      after consulting with my therapist (who happens to be me) i've concluded that it's probably fun to escape

10.27.21  1:54 pm   are you releasing an album? or have plans to release and album?

      i was hoping i could do better than that

10.27.21  1:33 pm   hellooo mr wurtz. what is it like being very cool?

     it's risky. if you get too cool you can die

     also do u like rats

      no but i respect them

10.27.21  12:48 pm   How do you go about fighting off perfectionism?

      i don't have to do that. i don't even like perfect things
